pr_title: Depend on Kogito Drools instead of Drools 7

timeline.author: triceo
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -19,8 +19,8 @@
     <!-- Dependencies -->
     <!-- ************************************************************************ -->
 
-    <!-- SNAPSHOT dependency versions -->
-    <version.org.kie>7.40.0-SNAPSHOT</version.org.kie>
+    <!-- SNAPSHOT and KIE dependency versions -->
+    <version.org.kie.kogito>0.11.1</version.org.kie.kogito>

replies.bodyText:
Also, we should discuss how we become part of the Kogito train.
(Not for this PR though.)
replies.author: triceo

replies.bodyText: Upgraded to 0.12. Yes, we must become part of the kogito release train before September. Ideally, the fix their drools 7 dependency issue first.
replies.author: ge0ffrey

timeline.bodyText: Although I don't have anything against this change, I don't see how it's related to the stated goal of this PR.
timeline.author: triceo

replies.bodyText: It comes from the same commit as the rest of the changes, so it will stay like that in the git history. Could we at least make it a separate commit?
replies.author: rsynek

replies.bodyText: Sorry about that. Next time I'll make it a separate commit, but sorting that out now for a git history that few people look at, isn't worth the hassle, I 'd argue.
replies.author: ge0ffrey

timeline.bodyText: There will be a conflict with #824
timeline.author: rsynek

replies.bodyText: Yes, unfortunate. Feel free to add to tomorrow's meeting if there's way to avoid this.
replies.author: ge0ffrey
